mdRecord.dcterms:description: Not completely legible graffiti about a dollar bill, to which two respond [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
my given dollar bill could have been in [illegible] | pay it forward | lucky dollar | Like to Please | The Box | WSF 10/30/12
